entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pull Diagnostics: Remove direct dependency on EnC, TaskList, Copilot diagnostic sources #72896
  • Make dotnet_diagnostic have priority and add analyzer to report diagnostics if you use value:severity while matching dotnet_diagnostic was defined #72889
    17.11
  • EnC: update MoveNext of deleted async lambda to throw #72887
  • preprocessor add more variables #72886
  • Bug with ref properties and IDE0052 #72884
    Backlog
  • string.Concat behavior difference in recent preview #72883

Closed

  • C# Roslyn "process terminated" NRE critical failure, with repro #72862
    17.11
  • Dynamic variables fail to interpolate when using a custom InterpolatedStringHandler #72606
    17.11
  • Assertion in `BindCollectionInitializerElementAddMethod` in ref struct error scenario #72762
    17.11
  • Enum values are not checked by IDE1006 (naming rules) #72574
  • Error running code action with `EnforceCodeStyleInBuild` in new Roslyn with .NET8 SDK #72879
  • Extensions with constrained generic types are not recommended when invoked on a generic method parameter #72457
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ISyntaxFacts from snippet work #72897
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update VS telemetry for devkit #72894
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enforce not using internal APIs in codestyle #72882
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Use collection expression in place of empty-enumerable #72895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make snippet generation strongly typed. #72892
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic option no longer read in product code. #72891
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add skipped test for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/72887 #72888
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Implement `do` snippet #72842
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove eventing from ExternalErrorDiagnosticUpdateSource #72774
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure taggers that compute frozen partial data eventually move to a 'correct' final state. #72878
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add helper for common pattern when creating solutions. #72881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Recommend extensions with matching constraints when the extension type is the generic type parameter #72853
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
  • Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
